title: 多容館電梯2主機更新行雲一莊電梯系統更新及停用公告。
content:
分類： 行政公告, 其他公告
來源： 總務處營繕組 - 劉宏銘 - hung.liu@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6376
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 多容館電梯2主機更新行雲一莊電梯系統更新及停用公告。
日期： Thu, 5 Dec 2024 13:23:11 +0800

(一)預計停用日期及施工項目如下:
１、113/12/6(五) ~113/12/13(五) 壽豐校區多容館電梯2主機更新。
２、113/12/6(五) ~113/12/13(五) 壽豐校區行雲一莊電梯控制系統更新。
(二)停用時間:多容館電梯2及行雲一莊均為113/12/6早上9點至113/12/13下午6點，如提前更換則提早開放，如有延後則另行公告。
(三)維修廠商：丞新米高企業社03-8530333連洽人：陳婉齡0958-989568。
(四)本校連洽人：壽豐校區 
現場監工人員:余少禾先生 0912-519581，承辦人員:劉宏銘 0922-591207。
總務處營繕組敬啟
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Announcement Title: Suspension and Updates for the Elevator System in the Multi-Purpose Building and Xingyun 1 Building
Announcement Content:
1.	Expected Suspension Dates and Construction Items:
1.1. From December 6 (Friday) to December 13 (Friday), 2024, the elevator main machine of the Multi-Purpose Building (Elevator 2) in Shoufeng Campus will be updated.
1.2. From December 6 (Friday) to December 13 (Friday), 2024, the elevator control system of the Xingyun 1 Building in Shoufeng Campus will be updated.
2.	Suspension Time: The suspension for both the Multi-Purpose Building Elevator 2 and the Xingyun 1 Building will be from 9:00 AM on December 6, 2024, to 6:00 PM on December 13, 2024.
If the work is completed earlier than expected, the elevator will be opened ahead of time. If there are delays, another announcement will be made.
3.	Maintenance Vendor:
	Vendor: Chengxin Meigao Enterprise
	Phone: 03-8530333
	Contact Person: Chen Wanling, 0958-989568
4.	Campus Contacts:
	On-site Supervisor: Mr. Yu Shaohe, 0912-519581
	Responsible Staff: Liu Hongming, 0922-591207
Sincerely, the Maintenance Team of the General Affairs Office
